      "likelihood": "High",
      "impact": "High",
      "risk_level": "Critical",

      "threat_category": "Repudiation",

      "likelihood": "Medium",
      "impact": "Medium",
      "risk_level": "Medium",

      "impact": "High",
      "risk_level": "High",
      "mitigation_strategy": "Implement input validation, use checksums or hashes to verify product data integrity.",

      "likelihood": "Medium",
      "impact": "High",
      "risk_level": "High",
      "mitigation_strategy": "Implement rate limiting on API endpoints, use CAPTCHA to mitigate automated requests.",
      "applicable_controls": ["V1.3.2"],
      "control_effectiveness": "Medium",
      "residual_risk_level": "Medium",
      "residual_risk_acceptance": "Requires Review"

      "component": "Backend API",

      "impact": "High",
      "risk_level": "Critical",
      "mitigation_strategy": "Use HTTPS to encrypt data in transit and implement robust authentication and authorization mechanisms.",

      "impact": "High",
      "risk_level": "High",

      "control_effectiveness": "Medium",
      "residual_risk_level": "Medium",
      "residual_risk_acceptance": "Requires Review"

      "threat_id": "THR-007",
      "component": "Admin Panel",
      "threat_category": "Elevation of Privilege",

      "likelihood": "Medium",
      "impact": "High",
      "risk_level": "High",
      "mitigation_strategy": "Implement strict access controls and user privilege management.",
      "applicable_controls": ["V2.1.2"],
      "control_effectiveness": "Medium",
      "residual_risk_level": "Medium",
      "residual_risk_acceptance": "Requires Review"
    },
    {
      "threat_id": "THR-008",

      "impact": "High",
      "risk_level": "Critical",
      "mitigation_strategy": "Implement input sanitization and output encoding practices.",
      "applicable_controls": ["V4.2.1"],

      "residual_risk_acceptance": "Accepted"

      "impact": "Critical",
      "risk_level": "Critical",

      "residual_risk_level": "Medium",

      "risk_level": "High",

      "residual_risk_level": "Medium",

      "impact": "Medium",
      "risk_level": "Medium",

      "residual_risk_acceptance": "Accepted"

      "residual_risk_acceptance": "Accepted"

      "component": "Backend API",

      "impact": "Medium",
      "risk_level": "High",
      "mitigation_strategy": "Implement rate limiting and monitoring to detect and block abnormal behavior.",

      "control_effectiveness": "Medium",
      "residual_risk_level": "Medium",
      "residual_risk_acceptance": "Requires Review"

      "control_effectiveness": "High",
      "residual_risk_level": "Low",
      "residual_risk_acceptance": "Accepted"
    },
    {
      "threat_id": "THR-016",
      "component": "Admin Panel",
      "threat_category": "Tampering",
      "description": "An attacker could tamper with admin panel data leading to unauthorized changes or deletions.",
      "likelihood": "Medium",
      "impact": "High",
      "risk_level": "High",
      "mitigation_strategy": "Ensure proper session management and limit access to the admin panel to authorized users only.",

      "control_effectiveness": "Medium",
      "residual_risk_level": "Medium",
      "residual_risk_acceptance": "Requires Review"

      "component": "Database",
      "threat_category": "Denial of Service",

      "impact": "High",
      "risk_level": "High",
      "mitigation_strategy": "Implement query optimization and monitoring to detect unusual query patterns.",

      "residual_risk_level": "Medium",
      "residual_risk_acceptance": "Requires Review"

      "residual_risk_acceptance": "Requires Review"

      "impact": "High",
      "risk_level": "High",
      "mitigation_strategy": "Ensure proper session expiration and invalidate sessions on log out.",

      "control_effectiveness": "Medium",

      "residual_risk_acceptance": "Requires Review"

      "impact": "High",

  "risk_summary": "The e-commerce platform faces significant risks primarily associated with critical components including user management, backend APIs, and payment gateways, where threats such as spoofing and sensitive data exposure are highly likely to occur. Key attack vectors include API abuse, improper access controls, and vulnerabilities in session management. The recommended areas for priority security controls are multi-factor authentication implementation, input validation mechanisms, and robust logging practices to reduce overall risk exposure."
}

threats.description: A user could deny having performed an action (e.g., a purchase) if there is no logging mechanism or audit trail in place.

threats.description: An attacker could overwhelm the shopping cart service with excessive requests, leading to service unavailability.
threats.mitigation_strategy: Implement rate limiting on API endpoints, use CAPTCHA to mitigate automated requests.

threats.mitigation_strategy: Ensure the payment gateway uses strong encryption and perform regular security audits.

threats.description: An unprivileged user could gain access to the admin panel through misconfigured permissions.
threats.mitigation_strategy: Implement strict access controls and user privilege management.

threats.description: An attacker could inject malicious scripts into web pages viewed by other users, stealing their session data.
threats.mitigation_strategy: Implement input sanitization and output encoding practices.

threats.description: An attacker could exploit vulnerabilities in the database layer to execute arbitrary SQL commands, exposing sensitive data.
threats.mitigation_strategy: Implement parameterized queries and prepared statements, regularly conduct security assessments.

threats.description: Sensitive order information could be disclosed due to improper access controls.
threats.mitigation_strategy: Implement strict access controls for user order views, ensuring only owners can view their orders.

threats.mitigation_strategy: Apply throttling mechanisms to limit request rates during checkout.

threats.description: An attacker could cause the application to become unresponsive by submitting excessive requests for product catalog queries.

threats.description: An attacker could exploit insecure password reset processes to gain unauthorized account access.

threats.mitigation_strategy: Implement rate limiting and monitoring to detect and block abnormal behavior.

threats.description: Sensitive payment information could be exposed due to misconfigurations or vulnerabilities in the payment processing logic.
